'''2.1.2337-beta''' ([[wikipedia:Microsoft Windows|Windows]]), '''2.1.2338-beta''' ([[wikipedia:macOS|macOS]]), or '''2.1.2339-beta''' ([[wikipedia:Linux|Linux]]) is an update to the [[Minecraft launcher|launcher]] released on February 6, 2019.

== Additions ==
* Added a beta update switch in the Settings page.
* New game log window with improved performance.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed bugs related to links and UNC folder paths.
* Fixed missing Bootstrap version information on the version page.
